傹字的基本解释

傹
jìng
古同“竟”，尽；终尽。
古同“竞”。

傹字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jìng］
［《集韻》渠映切，去映，羣。］
(1)强。
(2)同“竟”。终。

傹字的康熙字典解释

【子集中】【人字部】　傹； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页115第04
【字彙】同僵。【荀子·仲尼篇】可吹而傹也。【註】傹當爲僵，言可以氣吹之而僵仆也。　又同競。【周禮·春官·鍾師註】繁遏執傹也。

考證：〔【荀子·仲尼篇】可吹而傹也。【註】言其人可以氣吹之使仆，喻不足恃也。〕　謹照原文於註下改：傹當爲僵，言可以氣吹之而僵仆也。
傹字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
傹字的起名意思

暂无。

["Ji Yun" Qu Ying cut, go to Ying, group. ]

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset] [Human Character Department] 　傹; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 115 04
【Vocabulary】Same as dead. 【Xunzi·Zhongni Chapter】It can be blown and sing. [Note] Sui is considered to be stiff, and the words can be blown out of breath and stiff.　Competition again. 【Zhou Li·Chun Guan·Zhong Shi's Note】Fan curb and clingy. Textual research: [[Xunzi·Zhongni Chapter] can be blown out. [Note] It is not enough to say that the person can make a servant by blowing air. 〔〕 　 I would like to change the note according to the original text: I think it is stiff, and the words can be blown and stiff.
